page.title: 07Friday with Kirsty (1)
page.content: On Fridays I usually get up at 7.50p.m. I get washed and dressed and have my breakfast. This is usually toast and a cup of tea. After that my brother and i set off for school. My brother's name is Darran. He is fourteen years old and he goes to Penwortham Priory High School. I get to school at about twenty to eight.I play with Mandy, Carla and Donna. At five to nine we go into school and hang our coats up. We go to our classroom where our teacher, Mrs.Moore, checks the register. Then we go into assembly, which is taken by our headmaster, Mr.Bond. During the morning we do Maths and English. Sometimes we have homework from the day before so we have to mark that. Friday is dinner money day. Dinners cost two pounds fifty-five pence each week.(Contd.)
